data.text:
For other articles titled Bruce, see Bruce (disambig)

Bruce Holman is an American actor.

Biography[]

He was born in Seal Beach, California, in the United States.

Acting Credits[]

Movie(s)[]

"The Addams Family" (1991) as Office Worker 1 (uncredited)

"The Lawnmower Man" (1992) as Crime Scene Detective (uncredited)

"Diggstown" (1992) as Yelling Ringside Spectator (uncredited)

"The Bodyguard" (1992) as Rotory Club VIP on Dais (uncredited)

"Chaplin" (1992) as Beach Party Guest (uncredited)

"Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult" (1994) as Precinct Detective (uncredited)

"Clear and Present Danger" (1994) as FBI Agent (uncredited)

"Outbreak" (1995) as Aid to White House Chief-of-Staff Seated Against Wall (uncredited)

"Black Sheep" (1996) as Uniform Officer at Governor's Campaign Rally (uncredited)

"Broken Arrow" (1996) as Chairman Aid

"Down Periscope" (1996) as Selection Board Officer (uncredited)

"Eraser" (1996) as FBI Agent Firing Machine Gun (uncredited)

"Air Force One" (1997) as Secret Service Agent #4

"Gang Related" (1997) as Crime Scene Officer Checking Car Trunk (uncredited)

"Starship Troopers" (1997) as Jump Ball Referee (uncredited)

"A Civil Action" (1998) as Federal Marshall

"Fight Club" (1999) as Waiter in Bridgeworth Suites Corporate Video (uncredited)

"S.W.A.T." (2003) as Painter Covering Graffiti (uncredited)

"The Devil's Rejects" (2005) as County Sheriff (uncredited)

"Beerfest" (2006) as Xylophone player (uncredited)

"Changeling" (2008) as Execution Observer (uncredited)

"The Perfect Game" (2009) as Newspaper reporter (uncredited)

"Miss Nobody" (2010) as Detective (uncredited)

"Hitchcock" (2012) as Film crew

TV Movie(s)[]

"Barbarians at the Gate" (1993) as Businessman Entering Elevator (uncredited)

"Confessions of Sorority Girls" (1994) as Uniform Officer on Beach (uncredited)

"All the Way" (2016) as LBJ Advisor / Senator (uncredited)

TV Series[]

"Unsolved Mysteries" (1991) as Detective (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Herman's Head" (1991) as Officer Worker in Hallway (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Get a Life" (1991) as Uniform Officer with Shotgun (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Jake and the Fatman" (1992) as Crime Scene Detective (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Arresting Behavior" (1992) as Officer in Fight (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Diagnosis Murder" (1994) as Uniform Officer Running in Parking Garage (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Freaks and Geeks" (2000) as Secret Service Agent (uncredited; 1 episode)

"24" (2001 - 2002) as Secret Service Agent (uncredited; 2 episodes)

"The Guardian" (2004) as Dr. Silverman (1 episode)

"One on One" (2004) as Club Manager (uncredited; 1 episode)

"E-Ring" (2005) as Board Room / Hallway / Officer in Situation Room (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Arrested Development" (2005) as County Sheriff (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Monk" (2005) as Crime Scene Detective / Precinct Detective (uncredited; 4 episodes)

"Bones" (2006) as Max Kane (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Standoff" (2006) as Classroom Observer (uncredited; 1 episode)

"The King of Queens" (2005 - 2007) as Office Worker Exiting Elevator / Store Customer (uncredited; 2 episodes)

"How I Met Your Mother" (2008) as Art Gallery Bystander (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Dexter" (2006 - 2013) as Det. Michael Soderquist (uncredited; 89 episodes)

"Ray Donovan" (2013) as L.A. County Sheriff (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Castle" (2009 - 2014) as Precinct Detective (uncredited; 2 episodes)

"The Mentalist" (2014) as Forager #3 (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Revenge" (2014) as FBI Agent (uncredited; 1 episode)

"State of Affairs" (2015) as Ar Rissalah Terrorist #4 / Businessman Under Arrest (uncredited; 3 episodes)

"The Big Bang Theory" (2015) as Airport Pedestrian (uncredited; 1 episode)

"The Middle" (2015) as Construction Worker (uncredited; 1 episode)

"Crazy Ex-Girlfriend" (2016) as AA Meeting Attendee / Airport Pedestrian / Warehouse Worker (uncredited; 4 episodes)

Video(s)[]

"Face Office" (2010) as The Boss

Ookiness[]

Holman plays an uncredited Office Worker 1 in the 1991 film The Addams Family.
